mapper.select: select dmid,dmtitle,dmurl,dmcontent,dmhits,previd,prevtitle,nextid,nexttitle from (select dmid,dmtitle,dmurl,dmcontent,dmhits, lag(dmid,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as previd, lag(dmtitle,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as prevtitle, lead(dmid,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as nextid, lead(dmtitle,1,0)over(order by dmdate)as nexttitle from digitalMovie) where dmid=#{dmid}
